title: Heterogeneous solvent-metal-free aerobic oxidation of alcohol under ambient conditions catalyzed by TEMPO-functionalized porous poly(ionic liquid)s
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20199-20209
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02241F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yaping She, Xinyu Chen, Mengya Wang, Anqiu Liu, Xiaochen Wang, Daming Gao, Kunhong Hu, Miao Hu
TEMPO-functionalized porous poly(ionic liquid)s prepared via copolymerization exhibits high catalytic efficiency under solvent-metal-free conditions. This study provides a green and sustainable approach for the aerobic oxidation of alcohols.
